title: Structural Phenomena in Jolfa Region
content: The faults and foldings, small and big, which show the tectonic activities in the surroundings of Jolfa are among the spectacular sites in this region. A part of these structural phenomena has a good outcrop in the Paleozoic formations near the St. Stepanus church. In the south of Jolfa city near Hadishahr town, some beautiful phenomena are accessible in the younger formations (Miocene and Quaternary).

gallery.caption: ST9-1 :A scenic folding near a ruined water mill
ST9-2 :The folding and faulting in the Paleozoic formations
ST9-3 :An anticline and the arc of St. Stepanus church
ST9-4 :A very scenic folding near Hadi Shahr
